objects.text:
• Adjustable Height (19" to 24.5")
• Hidden Storage Compartment
• Perfect for Living Room & Office

product_details.description: Overall size of coffee table: 41”L x 19.5”W x 19”-24.5 H. Adjustable Height: Coffee table´s innovative design with hidden compartment and lift tabletop can be adjusted vertically from 19’’ to 24.5 to meet your different demands of desired height. Just lifting it effortlessly, there is extra storage room provided. And the stability will also be guaranteed while adjusting. Storage Construction: Made of chipboard, solid wood and metal piece, Tangkula coffee table features large storage rooms with 3 divided storage design, which can well accommodate your various kinds of accessories or stuffs, such as your notebooks, glasses or other things. Practicable Design: Our coffee table is widely applied in office or home as a perfect coffee table or living room furniture for its spacious work area. Its compact structure and beautiful texture can surprisingly highlight your office or home decor, perfect for your office, living room, or study. Brand - Tangkula ** Product Dimensions - 19"D x 41"W x 24.5"H ** Maximum Weight Recommendation - 220 Pounds ** Color - White ** Product Care Instructions - Wipe with Dry/Damp Cloth **

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, modern split layout with a muted beige and cream background. The left half includes a headline (`heading`) in bold, dark chocolate brown sans-serif font establishing product focus, followed by a minimalist subheading (`tagline`) describing its purpose. Below, a feature list (`description`) highlights key product capabilities. The price (`price`) stands out with a futuristic bold font, and a solid rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled by `cta` appears below, encouraging purchase. The right side prominently displays a product image (`product_image`) of a functional coffee table. Light grid patterns and a subtle wavy line add visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream: #F5F0EA
- Beige: #E3D5C8
- Dark Brown: #4A3520
- Accent Brown: #8B5A2B
- Light Brown (text): #6D4C31
- White (text): #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a modern, multifunctional coffee table with a lift-top feature. The primary colors used are a clean, bright white (#FFFFFF) for the table body and a warm, medium brown wood tone (#8B5E3C) for the tabletop. The use of white gives a minimalist and spacious look, while the wood top adds warmth and contrast. Subtle complementary accent tones like soft beige (#D2B48C), sage green (#78866B), and dark gray (#4B4B4B) from the stored items enhance the visual appeal. These colors are well-blended, with the white highlighting the wooden top and accessories while maintaining a modern aesthetic.
